summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York discussing a request to interview a witness as a 'spin-off' from the Ghislaine Maxwell case to determine whether to open a new investigation. The email coordinates scheduling and participation for the interview.

events.title: Email coordination for witness interview
events.description: Email correspondence discussing plans to interview a witness as a spin-off from the Ghislaine Maxwell case to decide on opening a new investigation.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was considering interviewing a witness as a 'spin-off' from the Ghislaine Maxwell case.
The purpose of the interview was to decide whether to open a new investigation.
The email was sent on April 28, 2021, indicating ongoing investigative activity related to the Maxwell case at that time.
